name: ScenarioAIConversationLineFlags
fields: wait after until told to advance

fields.name: cortana hack
fields.comment: use this to get 99 lives on super mario bros 2 the lost levels

fields.name: use demo ui
fields.comment: changes what tags are used to build the cache file

fields.name: enable color correction
fields.comment: makes the game look worse by running it through an ntsc->srgb filter

fields.name: do not apply bungie campaign tag patches
fields.comment: disable patches made to various tags such as the pistol when building for singleplayer

fields.name: child scenario
fields.comment: This scenario tag will be merged into the main scenario tag (and dereferenced) on map build.

fields.name: desired permutation
fields.comment: when non-zero the game will try use model permutations with a matching number suffix

fields.name: bsp indices
fields.comment: Unused in Gearbox versions of Halo PC; bitmask

fields.name: rounds reserved
fields.comment: does not include loaded rounds; cannot go above maximum rounds

fields.name: bsp indices
fields.comment: Unused in Gearbox versions of Halo PC; bitmask

fields.name: primary rounds reserved
fields.comment: does not include loaded ammo; can go above maximum rounds

fields.name: secondary rounds reserved
fields.comment: does not include loaded ammo; can go above maximum rounds

name: ScenarioTriggerVolume
title: name
comment: original definitions have every float as an individual member called "parameters"

fields.name: spawn time
fields.comment: 0 = use default spawn time in item_collection

fields.name: variant numbers
fields.comment: Determines which kind of variant gets a given line. By default, this matches by tag path (bisenti = 2, fitzgerald/jenkins = 4, aussie = 5, mendoza = 6, sarge/johnson = 100, sarge2/lehto = 101, everything else = 0, null = 65535)

fields.name: skies
fields.comment: Skies are referenced directly by the BSP tag.

fields.name: type
fields.comment:
Determines the scenario type, which determines how a map should be compiled and loaded.

* For multiplayer maps, everything is put into a map.
* For singleplayer maps, part of the globals tag is removed, and some of the tags are modified if `do not apply bungie campaign tag patches` is not set.
* For user interface maps, most of the globals tag is removed.

For Xbox maps, this also determines the maximum cache file size.

fields.name: child scenarios
fields.comment:
When this scenario is built into a cache file, all scripts, AI reflexives, and object spawns referenced by the child scenarios are merged into this scenario, after which this reflexive is cleared.

This is generally used for having one main scenario, with other parts of the scenario being worked on separately in child scenarios.
